logical function isValid(s1, s2)
   character(len=*), intent(in) :: s1, s2
   logical, dimension(0:255) :: present
   integer :: i, c, len_s1, len_s2

   present = .false. len_s1 = len_trim(s1)
   do i=1, len_s1
      c = ichar(s1(i:i))
      present(c) = .true.  ! mark that this character is present in s1
   end do

   len_s2 = len_trim(s2)
   do i=1, len_s2
      c = ichar(s2(i:i))
      if (.not. present(c)) then
         isValid = .false. return
      end if
   end do

   isValid = .true.
end function isValid

end program codeforces_408B

Function isValid(s1, s2) result(is_v)
   logical :: is_v
   character(len=*), intent(in) :: s1, s2
   logical, dimension(256) :: present
   integer :: i, c
 
   present = .false. do i = 1, len_trim(s1) c = ichar(s1(i:i))

end function isValid

tree.original_reasoning:

Function isValid(s1, s2) result(is_v)
   logical :: is_v
   character(len=*), intent(in) :: s1, s2
   logical, dimension(256) :: present
   integer :: i, c
 
   present = .false.
   do i = 1, len_trim(s1)
      c = ichar(s1(i:i))
      present(c) = .true.
   end do
 
   do i =1, len_trim(s2)
      c = ichar(s2(i:i))
      if (.not. present(c)) then
         is_v = .false.
         return
      end if
   end do
 
   is_v = .true.
end function isValid

Program codeforces_408B
  implicit none
  character(len=100000) :: s1, s2
  logical :: valid
  integer, dimension(0:255) :: count1, count2
  integer :: ans, i, c

  read*, s1, s2
  valid = isValid(s1, s2)

  if (.not. valid) then
    print*, -1
    stop
  end if

  ! Initialize counts to zero
  count1 = 0
  count2 = 0

  ! Count each character in s1
  do i = 1, len_trim(s1)
     c = ichar(s1(i:i))
     count1(c) = count1(c) +1
  end do

  ! Count each character in s2
  do i = 1, len_trim(s2)
     c = ichar(s2(i:i))
     count2(c) = count2(c) +1
  end do

  ans = 0

  ! Iterate over all possible ASCII codes
  do c = 0, 255
     if (count2(c) >0) then
        ans = ans + min(count1(c), count2(c))
     end if
  end do

  print*, ans

contains

logical function isValid(s1, s2)
   character(len=*), intent(in) :: s1, s2
   logical, dimension(0:255) :: present
   integer :: i, c, len_s1, len_s2

   present = .false.

   len_s1 = len_trim(s1)
   do i=1, len_s1
      c = ichar(s1(i:i))
      present(c) = .true.  ! mark that this character is present in s1
   end do

   len_s2 = len_trim(s2)
   do i=1, len_s2
      c = ichar(s2(i:i))
      if (.not. present(c)) then
         isValid = .false.
         return
      end if
   end do

   isValid = .true.
end function isValid

end program codeforces_408B
